description: Details required by conditions 10 (Car Park Management Plan), Condition 11 (Cycle Parking Details), Condition 13 (Refuse and Recycling Facilities) , Condition 21 (CO2 Emissions and Water Usage), Condition 22 (Replacement Access Point Details), Condition 26 (Communal Space Management Plan), Condition 29 (Travel Plan), Condition 32 (Appearance Details), Condition 33 (Electric Charging Points), Condition 39 (Contamination Report), Condition 40 (Drainage Design) and Condition 41 (Drainage Design Evidence) of planning permission 18/14045/FUL
decision_conditions: The details submitted for Conditions 10 (Car Park Management Plan), Condition 11 (Cycle Parking Details), Condition 13 (Refuse and Recycling Facilities) , Condition 21 (CO2 Emissions and Water Usage), Condition 22 (Replacement Access Point Details), Condition 26 (Communal Space Management Plan), Condition 29 (Travel Plan), Condition 32 (Appearance Details), Condition 33 (Electric Charging Points), Condition 39 (Contamination Report), Condition 40 (Drainage Design) and Condition 41 (Drainage Design Evidence) of planning permission 18/14045/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and these conditions are hereby fully discharged.

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably. Amendments required to make the application acceptable are substantial and would materially change the development proposal.  They would require further consultation to be undertaken prior to determination which could not take place within the statutory determination period specified by the Department of Communities and Local Government.
